cat >> /etc/hosts <<EOF 172.16.1.1 nimbus.storm nimbus 172.16.1.2 zookeeper.storm zookeeper 172.16.1.100 slave-0.storm slave-0 172.16.1.101 slave-1.storm slave-1 172.16.1.102 slave-2.storm slave-2 EOF
STORM_HOME="/opt/apache-storm-0.9.4"
ip_end=$(ifconfig eth1|grep "inet addr"|awk -F':' '{print $2}' |awk -F'[ .]' '{print $4}') while [ ! "$ip_end" ];do ip_end=$(ifconfig eth1|grep "inet addr"|awk -F':' '{print $2}' |awk -F'[ .]' '{print $4}') sleep 1 done hostname slave-$(($ip_end - 100))
site=$(neuca-user-data |grep physical_host|awk -F'[=-]' '{print $2}') while [ ! "$site" ];do site=$(neuca-user-data |grep physical_host|awk -F'[=-]' '{print $2}') done
cat >> $STORM_HOME/conf/storm.yaml <<EOF supervisor.scheduler.meta: site: "$site" EOF
cat >> /etc/supervisord.conf << EOF [program:storm_supervisor] command=$STORM_HOME/bin/storm supervisor autostart=true autorestart=true startsecs=1 startretries=999 redirect_stderr=false stdout_logfile=/var/log/storm-nimbus-out stdout_logfile_maxbytes=10MB stdout_logfile_backups=10 stdout_events_enabled=true stderr_logfile=/var/log/storm-nimbus-err stderr_logfile_maxbytes=100MB stderr_logfile_backups=10 stderr_events_enabled=true EOF
service supervisord start
